course_description: Students who have successfully completed qualifying examinations and are working on the dissertation must enroll in this course during each fall and spring semester in order to maintain continuous enrollment. Summer registration is not required or allowed unless summer is the graduation term.
prerequisites: This course is limited to students in the Doctor of Theology of program only.
